(In the Navigation bar on the left of the page)

When animating anchor tags (containing text) with -moz-transition, the padding animation looks wierd : Letters are 'shaking' while they move left as if each letter was animated indivudually or something.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Set an anchor tag with padding : 0 and a :hover pseudo class with padding-left : 1em (or px)
2. Use -moz-transition : all 1s;
3. Watch the ugly transition and cry :(


Expected Results:  
A nice and smooth animation (see webkit)

comments.text:
> A nice and smooth animation (see webkit)

Webkit will round your fractional letter-spacing to the nearest pixel, so it's just not rendering the same thing that we are.....
